mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MDCD AS MILDSC , DEPT_CD , DEPT_NM , SEQC AS ORDER_NO , DEPT_ABRVWD_NM AS DEPT_ABRVWD , WHL_DEPT_NM AS Full_DEPT_NM , HGRNK_DEPT_CD , TELNO FROM tbl_dept_n WHERE HGRNK_DEPT_CD IN ( SELECT DEPT_CD FROM tbl_dept_n WHERE MDCD = #{mildsc} AND HGRNK_DEPT_CD = '#' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) ORDER BY ORDER_NO, DEPT_NM

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT MDCD AS MILDSC , DEPT_CD , DEPT_NM , SEQC AS ORDER_NO , DEPT_ABRVWD_NM AS DEPT_ABRVWD , WHL_DEPT_NM AS Full_DEPT_NM , HGRNK_DEPT_CD , TELNO FROM tbl_dept_n WHERE 1=1 AND MDCD = REPLACE(#{mildsc},'1290451','A') AND HGRNK_DEPT_CD = #{hgrnkDeptCd} ) ORDER BY ORDER_NO, DEPT_NM
SELECT DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM FROM tbl_dept_n WHERE 1=1 AND MDCD = REPLACE(#{mildsc},'1290451','A') AND DEPT_CD = #{deptCd}

SELECT DEPT_CD, DEPT_NM FROM tbl_dept_n WHERE 1=1 AND MDCD = REPLACE(#{mildsc},'1290451','A') AND DEPT_CD IN (SELECT HGRNK_DEPT_CD FROM tbl_dept_n WHERE MDCD = REPLACE(#{mildsc},'1290451','A') AND DEPT_CD = #{deptCd} )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_user_n WHERE 1=1
AND MDCD = #{mildsc}
AND MDCD = 'A'
AND ( id like '%' || #{searchTxt} ||'%' OR FULNM like '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%' )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_BOARD_n WHERE 1=1 AND BLTNBD_CD= #{boardCd}
AND ( TITLE like '%' || #{searchTxt} ||'%' OR CTNT like '%' || #{searchTxt} || '%' )

SELECT SEQ , BLTNBD_CD as BOARD_CD , TITLE , CTNT as CONTENT , OPNPBL_YN as STATE , INQRY_NMBR as CNT , RGST_DTTM as REG_DT , RGST_ID as REG_ID , RGST_MDCD as REG_MILDSC , MDFC_DTTM as UPT_DT , MDFC_ID as UPT_ID , MDFC_MDCD as UPT_MILDSC , FILEATCH_NUM FROM TBL_BOARD_n WHERE 1=1 AND SEQ = #{seq} AND BLTNBD_CD = #{boardCd}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_BOARD_n SET title = #{title}, ctnt = CHAR_TO_CLOB(#{content}), mdfc_dttm = SYSDATETIME, mdfc_id = #{uptId}, mdfc_mdcd = #{uptMildsc}, mdfc_ip = #{uptIp} WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq} AND bltnbd_cd = #{boardCd}
mapper.select: SELECT A.SEQ , A.MDCD as MILDSC , A.ID as MNGR_ID , A.DEPT_CD , A.WHL_DEPT_CD_NM as FULL_DEPT_CD FROM TBL_MNGR_n A WHERE 1=1 AND SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_MNGR_n WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_facility_n A LEFT JOIN tbl_dept_n C ON A.dept_cd=C.dept_cd AND A.MDCD = C.MDCD WHERE 1=1
AND A.RGST_ID = #{regId}
AND A.MDCD = #{mildsc}

AND A.INSTLA_NM like '%' || #{searchTxt} ||'%'
AND A.TELNO like '%' || #{searchTxt} ||'%'
AND C.WHL_DEPT_NM like '%' || #{searchTxt} ||'%'
AND A.RGST_ID like '%' || #{searchTxt} ||'%'
SELECT A.seq , A.MDCD as mildsc , A.INSTLA_NM as facility_nm , A.dept_cd , A.TELNO as tel , A.WHL_DEPT_CD_NM as full_dept_cd FROM tbl_facility_n A WHERE 1=1 AND SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_FACILITY_n SET INSTLA_NM = #{facilityNm}, MDCD = REPLACE(#{mildsc},'1290451','A'), DEPT_CD = #{deptCd}, WHL_DEPT_CD_NM = #{fullDeptCd}, TELNO = #{tel}, MDFC_DTTM = SYSDATETIME, MDFC_ID = #{uptId}, MDFC_MDCD = #{uptMildsc}, MDFC_IP = #{uptIp} WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
